column.name: category_name
column.text: 虚拟列，关联查询时使用

statements.statement:
SELECT A.*, B.name as category_name FROM sys_dictionary A left join sys_category B ON A.category_code = B.code where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> and (B.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.id like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or B.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' ) </#if> <#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if> <#if query.code??> and A.code = '${query.code}' </#if> <#if query.codes??> and A.code in ( <#list StringUtil.split(query.codes,',') as code> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(code)}' <#if code_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#-- 获取下级节点(一层) --> <#if query.parentCode??> and A.pid in ( select id from sys_dictionary where code='${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.parentCode)}') </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}%' </#if> <#if query.value??> and A.value like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}%' </#if>
<#if query.values??> and A.value in ( <#list StringUtil.split(query.values,',') as value> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(value)}' <#if value_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}%' </#if>
<#if query.categoryName??> and B.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.categoryName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.nodePathList?? && (query.nodePathList?size > 0)> and ( <#list query.nodePathList as nodePath> A.node_path like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(nodePath)}%' <#if nodePath_has_next>or</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by sn </#if> </#if>

select * from sys_dictionary where 1=1 and pid in (select id from sys_dictionary where code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(param[0])}' and app_code='${StringUtil.escapeSql(param[1])}' and category_code='dictionary') <#if param[2]??> and enable='${param[2]}' </#if> order by sn
